about_the_game:
Project FD is a multiplayer action game that combines dungeon escape survival with high-quality pixel art.

You play as adventurers with different abilities in ancient ruins, fighting monsters, completing quests, finding loot, and escaping.

Battle

  • Team up with up to 2 players and explore dungeon filled with threats. Of course, it is also possible to venture alone.

  • You must respond to various situations by combining various characters.

  • Use powerful and special consumable items to overcome crisis situations.

Quest

  • Obtain weapons that preserve the glory of the past within the dungeon.

  • Retrieve the valuables you were asked to search for and escape safely.

  • Explore many kinds of dangerous maps.

Survival

  • Face various dangers such as monsters, anomalies, and traps.

  • Use the various devices remaining in the ruins to help you survive

  • Obtain an arcane seal to get strengthening effects to respond to rapidly changing situations.

Progress

  • Develop various characters with unique occupations.

  • Set up various equipment to maximize your character’s abilities.

  • Complete your character’s skill tree according to your desired characteristics 

Manage

  • Run an adventurer's guild that attracts special guests from the city where the ruins were discovered.

  • Assist adventurers exploring the dungeon escape safely.

  • Broker requests from guests looking for items that can only be found in the dungeon and acquire benefits.

About Project FD

Project FD is being developed by a small team that loves a variety of Co-op multiplayer games, dungeon crawlers, and loot shooter genres.  If you enjoyed  the Diablo series, Strange Dungeon series and Darkest Dungeon series, and Dark and Darker, Project FD will give you with a unique and new fun experience in the dungeon crawler genre.

name: Project FD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 / 11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 / Intel® Core™ i3-6100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 460 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 / Intel® Core™ i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 470 / Intel® Arc™ A750 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Project FD combines dungeon extraction games and pixel art to create a new action experience. Explore dungeons discovered in ancient ruins , overcome monsters and traps, complete missions, and acquire loot. If you work together with friends, you can deal with many more threats.
